TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sarad, title = Sarad, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarad} }

S.FORM: alang Sarad ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Ci'an go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 3,309 buwan, 8,721 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 7 kyan ku 608 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 93 kyan ku 8,113 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 5 , Truku 1 , Bunun 0.5 . maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Sarad hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Sarad hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Sarad hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Sarad hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Sarad hya' ga Fulufuluan. tay 'zil na Sarad hya' ga Sirakesay. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
